fullplot: Is it possible to live aside of the system, thinking only about the present and oneself? A feature film about Manuel Vèzquez, the best comic book author in Barcelona during the sixties, but, mainly, a man with a very particular way of living his life.
plot: Is it possible to live aside of the system, thinking only about the present and oneself? A feature film about Manuel Vèzquez, the best comic book author in Barcelona during the sixties, but...
title: The Great Vazquez
